Dear Graydon:
The Fund for Adult Education has made the sum of
$150,000 available to the Committee for its fiscal
year beginning April 1, 1954 and running through
March 31, 1955. In addition, permission has been
granted for the expenditure of the balance
remaining from our 1953-54 fiscal year.
As you will note by the enclosed agenda, discussion
of the program for the coming year, and recommended
use of the Committeeâ€™s funds to achieve it, occupy
the major portion of our business meeting.
For your background information, I am enclosing
a copy of the financial statement for the JCET-
AASA exhibit, and also our current monthly
statement. It should be pointed out that the
balance listed on this statement does not reflect
the expenditures during March not yet billed.
Looking forward to seeing you in Columbus.
Sincerely,
RalWi Steetle
Executive Director
